author: Zack Budryk
title: Susan Rice scolds Pompeo for using 'Wuhan virus' term
description: Former White House national security adviser Susan Rice rebuked Secretary of State Mike Pompeo Tuesday for referring to the novel coronavirus as the "Wuhan virus" on MSNBC's "Andrea Mitchell Reports.""It's shameful...
